content.question: Art historians have theorized that the beaker with ibex motifs was most likely made for

choices.label: luxury purposes because it was discovered in the ruins of a palace
military exercises because it was discovered in the ruins of a citadel
funerary rituals because it was discovered in a grave
religious use because it was discovered in a cave

content.answer: funerary rituals because it was discovered in a grave

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Explain how one or more art historically valid interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art) are derived from an analysis of its form, style, materials, content, function, context, reception, and/or meaning.
